transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan Maurya sahab good morning.
Customer: Morning, morning Himanshu ji.
Executive: Haan last aaj mauka hai aapse baat karne ka kal se to main rahunga nahi.
Customer: Kyun? Kahan ja rahe ho?
Executive: Are sir, are nahi wo ho jata hai na renewal jaise aapka tha to hamare paas jaise ye sir khud hi bolte hain kal se main rahunga nahi.
Customer: Are aapke matlab account manager se related aapke account se related jaise Pranchi hai, Vivek hai aur phir main hun teen log hain matlab phir wo band ho jayega aur phir data jaise hota hai na kahin matlab usme ki purane client walon mein list mein chala jata to wo log dekhte hain wo sari cheeze band ho jati hai phir naya wo hota hai na apna due date khatam ho gaya na sir. Ye jo grace period tha wo bhi sir khatam ho gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapka haan grace period bhi khatam ho gaya.
Customer: Khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Haan 22 ko tha na to 22 se saat din ka hota hai to kal raat mein khatam ho gaya.
Customer: Kal raat ko khatam ho gaya hai.
Executive: Haan kal raat mein khatam hua tha 12 baje. Ji ji saat din ka grace hota hai malik chhod diya. Dekho kal isliye maine aapko bheja tha na meri matlab jitna ho sake higher authority sab jagah baat hui to koi usme to possibilities nahi tha is vajah se maine aapko basic wala do saal ka 52250 ki chalo at least hamare sath jude to rahenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo main turant actual mein main payment karne ja raha tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to isliye to performa pehle bheja tha aapko maine ki aap check kar lo sab.
Customer: Payment karne ja raha tha aur aapne phone pe bataya bhi nahi mujhe.
Executive: Achcha achcha. [inaudible] maine khol ke dekha tha.
Customer: Achcha pata nahi mere dhyan se nikal gaya hoga but maine maine to laga ki ye phir se Himanshu ji cheating kar rahe hain yaar.
Executive: Are nahi sir usse pehle aap dekho na usse pehle bhi jo bheja 17 valid wale sab kuch wahi bhej rakha tha aapko ki chalo kahin listing rahe wo isliye main pehle performa bhejta hun ki aap check kar lo sab aap okay ho tabhi aage process karo nahi to mat karo ye cheez main pehle hi bhejta hun sir. To isliye ji ji ji wo meri hai kyunki main agar saat saal aath saal se mujhe aage nahi rehna hai. Customer ko samajhte ho aap log ye log dekhenge to hai nahi.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai dekh aap dekho mera whatsapp check karo upar bhi jo likha hai MDC likha hai chalo upar dekh lo aap sabse upar jo bheja ek saal wala wo bhi MDC likha hai mini dynamic catalog only to jo hai wo likha hua hai. Sir mujhe aage bhi rakhna kaam karna hai aisa thodi ki abhi ja ke.
Customer: Nahi nahi aage karenge.
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab main mujhe rehna to sir keh rahe hain sir ki TrustSeal wala jo diya hai aapko final TrustSeal ka kitna bataya tha maine aapko do saal wala?
Customer: Jo aapne bataya tha wo samajh mein nahi aayi hai.
Executive: Nahi main TrustSeal nahi wo to aapne diya tha aur maine kitna bataya tha ek second aapko final kyunki sir dekho aapse baat bahut achche se karte ho main bhi bahut respectfully aapse baat karta hun to kahin na kahin ek achchi hai tuning isliye baat kar rahe hain kal se to nahi karunga but mere paas authority bhi nahi rahegi. To ek second aap ruko main dekh hi leta hun agar ek do percent aur hoga wo main dilwa dunga aapko. 9260 divided by 1.2. 50 bol rahe the aap sir itna dekh lo main bas main apne matlab personal relation pe aapse mang raha hun ki agar kar dete ho matlab 61 62 aa raha tha 62 mein aapko sir 6132 plus GST aapka kar dunga isme koi adjustment nahi hai 25 mahine ki service rahegi jo ki kal se chalu hogi 1 December se aur jo validity hogi wo 1 January 2028 tak chalegi sir 25 mahine to ye rahega aur main 70 buylead aur deta hun non lapsable jo matlab aapke sath cheating hui last mein jo bhi tha us basis pe keh raha hun ek mahina ye.
Customer: Amount kitna raha hai batao.
Executive: Amount aapka to aa raha hai 6132 plus 18% GST aapka jayega matlab ye aapka final rahega dekho last bar to aapne 67260 kiya tha abhi jo aa raha hai GST ke sath aapka jo aa raha hai 7018 GST ke sath aa raha hai 70 non lapsable buylead de raha hun aapko ek mahine extra service jo ki 1 December se validity hogi aur jo extend hoke jo jayegi aapka 1 January 2028 tak kal se chalu hoga. To ye sare cheez rahega aur ye aapko 200% aap aaj ek tarikh hai na teen tarikh ko aap dekh do ya teen tarikh ko live hogi service aapko verify karwa ke dashboard pe bula ke wahan pe dikhta hai date ke sath aur jo non lapsable valid hai wo bhi bula ke sab kuch dikha dunga nahi aayega aap paanch din ke andar refund aapka bill pura amount aapka refund ho jayega jo aapko commitment kiya hai wo pura aapka dikhayega dashboard pe aapke mail pe har cheez pe online video meeting pe bula ke aapko dikha dunga ki itna hai. To purane wala jo galti thi wo main man raha hun ki badi galti hai adjustment bol ke bataya nahi to hai galti sir but jitna ho sake main aapke liye try karunga aur jo bola hai amount mein aur ye dono cheez main aapke liye karke aur aapko return sab kuch performa pe bhi wo likha rahega sab kuch aapko milega aur teen din mein aapko online bula ke video meeting pe sab kuch main aapko dikha dunga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji ye main aapko mail bologe to mail dal dunga ki haan agar ye jo commitment bola hun nahi pura ho to 100% refund ho jayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Chalo sochta hun main.
Executive: Main ek bar performa bana ke bhejta hun sir. Theek hai. Aapko whatsapp pe please ek bar mere baat consider kar lijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's subscription grace period is over.

- Customer alleges potential cheating in past dealings.

- Wants to know the final amount.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for past errors.

- Offered 70 non-lapsable buyleads and extra service.

- Promised a refund if commitment not fulfilled.

- Will provide online video meeting for clarification.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a performa via WhatsApp.

- Customer will consider the offer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, refund, buyleads, gst, trustseal
